Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen raised his rifle, cursing as Set's smoke bomb sent smoke 
everywhere.  "I'll track the Pred," he whispered to Beachcomber, "You wait 
for reinforcements and attack."

Beachcomber nodded, as Smokescreen, the Maximal specializing in diversionary 
tactics, mostly with smoke, hence his name, carefully pursued Set, his optics 
used to the smoke, though it was hard to see in the poorly lit room.
